text: Haldane Alfred Griggs (November 27, 1900 - December 29, 1987) was a National Football League running back. He played five games for the Akron Indians. He was born in Toronto, Ontario, Canada. ==External links== * NFL.com Category:1900 births Category:1987 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Toronto Category:Canadian players of American football Category:American football halfbacks Category:Butler Bulldogs football players Category:Akron Indians players
title: Hal Griggs (American football)
